nodes.text: Chronicler was a position and title in the galaxy.
In 32 BBY, the Neimoidian author Viff Almay was appointed official chronicler of the Invasion of Naboo by the Trade Federation.
Within the Jedi Order, some historians bore the title of Chronicler. The Jedi Dorak was one such individual, holding the position during both the Mandalorian Wars and the Jedi Civil War.
